meanings.definition: Ceibas: plural of ceiba, a tropical tree with large buttress roots and fluffy white flowers.

meanings.sent2: I saw many ceibas while exploring the rainforest.

meanings.sent4: The ceibas stood tall like guardians of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: Under the canopy of the ceibas, the air was cool and fresh.
